import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { activeMenu: string = ''; isHovered: boolean = false; toggleMenu(menu: string) { this.activeMenu = this.activeMenu === menu ? '' : menu; } }
